alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 29 at 1:35AM PST until December 29 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR LADD AND PYLES CANYONS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected for Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The northern portion of the valley will have winds of 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
